issue.title: Color import can fail in CGAL mode
issue.body:
Importing a colored OFF/3MF file in CGAL mode, may fail with the following assertion:
```
Assertion failed: (polyset.color_indices.size() == polyset.indices.size()), function tessellate_faces, file PolySetUtils.cc, line 87.
```

TODO:
* [x] Write up test cases
* [x] Fix (e.g. by removing color before processing PolySets in CGAL mode.
